item.title: AccorHotels has launched its inaugural five-star international hotel in Vung Tau
item.description:
Source: AccorHotels. The Pullman Vung Tau. AccorHotels is introducing the Pullman Vung Tau, the first international five-star hotel in this coastal city just a 90-minute drive from Ho Chi Minh City. The Pullman Vung Tau offers views of both Back Beach and Front Beach and boasts the largest meeting facilities in Southern Vietnam, making it perfect for business travelers looking for a quick escape from Ho Chi Minh City...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accorhotels-has-launched-its-inaugural-five-star-international-hotel-in-vung-tau/
